findings.title: Missing checks for reward ratio numerator and denominator
findings.description: The staking contracts use `rewardRatioNumerator` and `rewardRatioDenominator` to set the reward tokens obtained from staking tokens. Due to the lack of checks that limit their values, the reward ratio could be set to 0% or higher than 100%, leading to unwanted reward values.

findings.title: Potential misuse of user funds in reward distribution due to incorrect constructor settings
findings.description: In the current design of the project, a single token is utilized for both staking and distributing rewards. The rewards are allocated to users from a `rewardWallet`, which is specified in the `constructors` of two related contracts. However, there is a potential issue: if the `rewardWallet` is inadvertently set to the contract's own address `address(this)`, it could lead to the misappropriation of funds.
